entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 3 by morning. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Temperature rising to minus 3 by morning. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy beginning near noon. Amount 10 cm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning then southeast 40 gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 in the Wreckhouse area late in the afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Rain at times heavy or snow. Temperature rising to 7 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy changing to rain at times heavy in the evening. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Rainfall amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind southeast 60 km/h gusting to 80 except gusting to 120 in the Wreckhouse area in the evening. Wind becoming south 60 gusting to 80 near midnight. Temperature rising to 7 by morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 12 January 2023
